Auto Generated Documentation¶

bin/confluence create CMI space.py¶

This python3 module creates a new space according to the CMI template. The CMI template includes a custom homepage, the space categories cfel-cmi and cmi-elog-calendar. You have to provide a servername and a user with rights to create a new space. Additional settings like the spacekey and name of the new space are required.

confluence_create_CMI_space.main()¶

Url to the Server. Please include a / after the url

bin/confluence static archive.py¶

This script downloads....

confluence_static_archive.main()¶

Main function of static_backup script. User is asked some needed information like server address and username.

bin/lib/spaces.py¶

spaces file

lib.spaces.auth(user, pwd, srv)¶

Try to logout from server in case any previous connection is still open. Finally login and return authentification token.

lib.spaces.createCMISpace(servername, user, spacekey, spacename)¶

Creates a new space (required spacekey, name), sets the homepage according to the CMI template and sets space categories cfel-cmi and cmi-elog-calendar

bin/lib/static archive.py¶

lib.static_archive.auth(user, pwd, srv)¶

Try to logout from server in case any previous connection is still open. Finally login and return authentification token.

lib.static_archive.getSpaceInfo(token, sk)¶

Return python list of details for a given spaces. Requires authentification token

lib.static_archive.saveConfluenceContent(token, id)¶

Return the clean html code of a confluence page or blog with a given id.Requires authentification token

lib.static_archive.recursivePagetreeHTML(parents, i)¶

Confluence does not provide a simple solution of getting the page tree as shown in the sidebar of confluence. This function requires an array of all page id of all pages with children and starts with i=0. With Recursion the page tree is returned.

lib.static_archive.getConfAttachments(token, contentid, dirname)¶

Downloads all attachments to a page and returns a html code block to be included onto a saved page which displays all attachments

lib.static_archive.startArchive(servername, user, sk, downloadPages, downloadBlog, downloadAttach)¶

Main function to start when downloading archives
